name: Raka's Journey
description:
Objective:
Makes sure Raka is save from many obstacle in his journey to seek the unknown!

How to play:
Either TAP, HOLD, or SWIPE to clear obstacles away from Raka!

  • Double Tap the rock until it breaks!
  • Tap once the lump until it gone!
  • Swipe the log away to the land!

Description :

Raka's is venturing on the secret beautiful river that took him in to the unknown. With strong determination, Raka will break through various obstacles. Help him pave the way so he can reach his destination.

This Game powerred by Phaser3 which this game is lightweight, and friendly to your every device :D

Crafted By Psychoverse. This game was made to participate Arkav Game Jam 2021.

Theme : Stream

Correlation with the theme : Raka's Venturing on the "streams" of the river.

Members : 

  • Arsyel (Game Programmer)
  • Dede Mastra ( Game Designer & Game Programmer)
  • Hasbi ( Music Composer)
  • Savira ( Game Artist)
  • Witsqa (Game Artist)
